house_listing.house_description: Spectacular bayfront. No condo fees, no maintenance, many custom features, fireplace in liv rm & master br. Great floor plan. Real eat-in kitchen, dining room, large liv rm, 2 decks on bayside. Seller can park up to 3 cars. Home warranty from seller.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style,Foyer, Pantry, Recreation Room, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
